thread.section_title: Breaking news on air travel - breakingnews.com
thread.title: Editor's note: We are aware of reports of a shooting at New York's LaGuardia Airport. There are also reports this was a police drill. We're watching for more details and confirmation. (This note was updated after additional reports.) - Stephanie
thread.title_full: Editor's note: We are aware of reports of a shooting at New York's LaGuardia Airport. There are also reports this was a police drill. We're watching for more details and confirmation. (This note was updated after additional reports.) - Stephanie

author: Stephanie Clary
title: Editor's note: We are aware of reports of a shooting at New York's LaGuardia Airport. There are also reports this was a police drill. We're watching for more details and confirmation. (This note was updated after additional reports.) - Stephanie
text: Aug 09, 2015, 05:02 AM GMT ( 05:02 ) Editor's note: We are aware of reports of a shooting at New York's LaGuardia Airport. There are also reports this was a police drill. We're watching for more details and confirmation. (This note was updated after additional reports.) - Stephanie End of note
